snippet: A technician’s error may have led to the fertilization of eggs by sperm from someone other than the intended donor....
abstract: Reproductive technology clinic at University Medical Center in Utrecht, Netherlands, apologizes for accidentally fertilizing eggs with wrong sperm; blames technician for rare error in procedure performed between April 2015 to November 2016 for couples who are currently being notified.
lead_paragraph: A technician’s error may have led to the fertilization of eggs by sperm from someone other than the intended donor.

headline.main: Dutch Fertility Clinic Investigates Possible Sperm Mix-Up
headline.print_headline: Dutch Fertility Clinic Investigates Possible Sperm Mix-Up
